requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 760 or equivalent with 4 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 980 or equivalent with 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or more
  • Processor: Pemtium III or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB or more

results.name: Chimeras: Mark of Death Collector's Edition

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 843 MB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 75 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
